Flow.description: A Flow Template for creating a Summit Event

Flow.label: Summit Event - Template

fields.name: Advanced_Questions_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Before proceeding, this process must loop through the number of advanced questions to be asked of attendees.


This is temporary until the Repeater element is made generally available.

value.stringValue: Will an itinerary be sent for appointments?

fields.name: Appointment_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Before proceeding, this process must loop through the number of appointments to be created.


This is temporary until the Repeater element is made generally available.

screens.label: Basic Questions

fields.name: Configuration_Questionnaire_Text

fields.name: CreateFirstInstanceDescription
fields.fieldText:
By default, we assume you will also want to create the first instance of this event.


If not, please toggle to No
